name: Starling
tip: Playing cheap cards with Fleeting means your deck will be better after you shuffle.

name: Heron
tip: Try to play Heron before you play too many cards without Fleeting, or hold onto it until after you shuffle.

name: Vulture
tip: Vulture gives you Nourish when it's played instead of when it resolves, meaning an earlier Heron can get rid of it.

name: Phoenix
tip: Phoenix is best when played early, so try to ramp into it.

name: Truth
tip: Sometimes you just need a card worth lots of points.

name: Nest
tip: Don't cover up the Nest, and it will keep making Doves round after round.

name: Rooster
tip: Rooster doesn't need to be immediately on top of a card to trigger its Morning ability.

name: Fledgling
tip: If your deck is full of Fleeting cards, Fledgling won't get covered and can come out more often after you shuffle.

name: Let Go
tip: Getting rid of lower cost cards can turn any deck into a hyperthin list.
